name: Solo Crisis
overview: Solo Crisis (ソロ・クライシス) is a simulation game for the Sega Saturn. Solo Crisis is often seen as the spiritual successor to Quintet's ActRaiser and ActRaiser 2, released on the Super NES (and published by Enix). While the ActRaiser games are a mixture between side-scrolling platforming and world building, Solo Crisis focuses solely on the world building aspect.
